Package evs.utilities

Utility classes.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
StaticClassInitializer Static classes that require initialization on start-up should implement this interface to initialize the required static members.
 

Class Summary
EVSConstants Constants used by the EVS.
EVSDefaults A class that stores default options for the EVS.
EVSUtilities A class doing various house keeping jobs in EVS
StringUtilities Collection of static methods for manipulating strings.
ThreadSafeSimpleDateFormat Thread safe date format.
 

Exception Summary
DateFormatException Class for throwing exceptions that signify an invalid date format.
 

Package evs.utilities Description

Utility classes.
